feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts
feed.subtitle: Posts. That have been deleted. From MetaFilter.

entry.title: Only in Germany
entry.content:
Post 191488 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey, this seems like an interesting read but this is also a sufficiently fraught moment in the world that trying to have a discussion about this specific reflection on Jewish life in Germany etc. that stays at all on topic is going to be unnecessarily difficult. Go ahead and revisit this at some point down the line. -- cortex
entry.summary: Post 191488 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey, this seems like an interesting read but this is also a sufficiently fraught moment in the world that trying to have a discussion about this specific reflection on Jewish life in Germany etc. that stays at all on topic is going to be unnecessarily difficult. Go ahead and revisit this at some point down the line. -- cortex
